comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: No hard hard, no visor or goggles, no protective gloves, no hi-vis jacket, and probably not steel-capped boots in those days .......  But fascinatingly historic.

comment.author: 35179849@N08
comment._content: No need for hi-viz jacket if no other idiot driving around in fork-lift or truck.   The thing that strikes me is how they made those brand-new building look quite old and decrepit,  maybe it is just the black and white film.

comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mich2009] Well I was kind of joking, but it is interesting how this photo records (by implication) how the whole Health & Safety thing in many countries has transformed the working environment, especially in industry and construction.
